topic.title: french blog if you want to download

1_1G4nMD7txaYAvdpDeroZ9f67K3gtHsGn8H.body: Le blog a été amélioré! This blog has been updated!

2_1M3WXb3DtLL9zsRy4ECqemV7ZyA4u4FNFU.body: I use Zeronet on my LG Nexus 5 which has Nethunter installed (Kali linux on android...). In this case, from a termianl window, I am able to download and launch Zeronet on the device. My Internet browser can connect to 127.0.0.1:43110 and I am able to create a Zeromail account... ;)
